title: Seniors help
content: Is pesu ring road campus better than dayanand sagar or bmsce or ramaiyah in terms of placement for cse specifically? If so how good is it. I am looking to join pes what should I expect there like any tips for your junior. How are the classes and faculty, do they allow laptops or ipads in class for digital note taking, how hard is the curriculum?

comments.body:
PES ring road is obviously better than Ramaiah and BMSCE (and idk why you even considered DSCE) in terms of placements. PES placements recently are only second to RVCE among any private colleges in Bengaluru.
PESU curriculum is generally more tough than the VTU curriculum (followed by RVCE, MSRIT and BMSCE).
